attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the people are fed up with all you stand for and wish to make our life better again. We wish to get better return for our taxes and see how our money is spent. We have had enough of your spin and wish for a government that care for the people that put you there.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
